statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE cost_saving_initiative = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_monitoring ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE cost_saving_initiative = FALSE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities FROM energy_consumption_monitoring;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, energy_usage, cost_saving_initiative FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_monitoring WHERE facility_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY facility_id;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_monitoring GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_energy_usage > 5000;
SELECT facility_name, cost_saving_initiative, energy_usage, energy_usage * 0.12 AS energy_tax FROM energy_consumption_monitoring ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT facility_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT facility_id, cost_saved, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM FacilityDetails WHERE facility_id = 1
SELECT facility_name, location FROM FacilityDetails
SELECT facility_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY facility_id DESC
SELECT * FROM FacilityDetails WHERE location = 'New York' AND facility_name LIKE '%Hospital%'
SELECT facility_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY facility_id HAVING MAX(energy_usage) > 500

SELECT FacilityDetails.facility_name, EnergyConsumption.energy_usage, EnergyConsumption.cost_saved FROM FacilityDetails INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption ON FacilityDetails.facility_id = EnergyConsumption.facility_id WHERE EnergyConsumption.energy_usage < 200 ORDER BY FacilityDetails.facility_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM FacilityDetails ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM facility_table;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility_table;
SELECT facility_name, energy_consumption FROM facility_table WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_table ORDER BY saving_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, consumption_amount FROM facility_table INNER JOIN energy_consumption_table ON facility_table.facility_id = energy_consumption_table.facility_id WHERE consumption_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM facility_table;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, energy_consumption FROM facility_table WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facility_table WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT f.facility_id, f.facility_name, ec.consumption_amount FROM facility_table f JOIN energy_consumption_table ec ON f.facility_id = ec.facility_id WHERE ec.consumption_amount > 500;

SELECT f.facility_name, cs.saving_amount, ec.consumption_amount FROM facility_table f LEFT JOIN cost_saving_table cs ON f.facility_id = cs.facility_id LEFT JOIN energy_consumption_table ec ON f.facility_id = ec.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM manufacturing_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_type='Electric';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_records WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, savings_amount, initiative_date FROM cost_saving_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM manufacturing_facilities WHERE total_energy_consumed >= 10000;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters JOIN energy_usage_records ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_usage_records.meter_id WHERE energy_consumed >= 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT facility_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM manufacturing_facilities JOIN energy_meters ON manufacturing_facilities.facility_id = energy_meters.facility_id JOIN energy_usage_records ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_usage_records.meter_id GROUP BY facility_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_initiatives WHERE savings_amount > 50000 AND initiative_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM facility_locations;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM facility_locations ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, savings_estimate FROM cost_saving_initiatives WHERE savings_estimate > 10000;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE reading_time >= '2022-01-01' AND reading_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT facility_id, year, total_cost FROM facility_energy_costs WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM facility_locations ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM facility_locations WHERE location='New York';
SELECT facility_id, AVG(total_cost) AS average_cost FROM facility_energy_costs GROUP BY facility_id HAVING AVG(total_cost) > 5000;
SELECT e.meter_id, e.reading_time, e.energy_reading, m.meter_type FROM energy_readings e JOIN energy_meters m ON e.meter_id = m.meter_id WHERE e.energy_reading > 1000;
SELECT i.initiative_name, i.savings_estimate, c.total_cost FROM cost_saving_initiatives i JOIN facility_energy_costs c ON i.initiation_date < '2022-01-01' AND c.facility_id = 1;
